17
18/* written by Jim Meyering */
19
20#include <fcntl.h>
21
22#include <sys/types.h>
23#include <sys/stat.h>
24#include <dirent.h>
25#include <unistd.h>
26
27#ifndef AT_FDCWD
28# define AT_FDCWD (-3041965) /* same value as Solaris 9 */
29# define AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW 4096 /* same value as Solaris 9 */
30
31# ifdef __OPENAT_PREFIX
32# undef openat
33# define __OPENAT_CONCAT(x, y) x ## y
34# define __OPENAT_XCONCAT(x, y) __OPENAT_CONCAT (x, y)
35# define __OPENAT_ID(y) __OPENAT_XCONCAT (__OPENAT_PREFIX, y)
36# define openat __OPENAT_ID (openat)
37int openat (int fd, char const *file, int flags, /* mode_t mode */ ...);
38# define fdopendir __OPENAT_ID (fdopendir)
39DIR *fdopendir (int fd);
40# define fstatat __OPENAT_ID (fstatat)
41int fstatat (int fd, char const *file, struct stat *st, int flag);
42# endif
43
44#endif
45
